page.title: 06Farms
page.content: On Saturday I was playing on a tree in my Grandad's garden. I was making a tree house out of wood and I fell out the tree and banged my arm hard on the ground, it hurt me and I cried. The next day it was still hurtting so my Mum took me to the hospital and I had a X-Ray they found out that my arm was broken . Then they put my arm in plaster and then I went home. After three weeks I had my plaster off. { { FARMING In 1902 the farmers grew mainly wheat,barley,turnips,potatoes and mangols for the cattle.The mangols were pulped in a ginny ring,which was driven by a horse going round in circles.
